0.title: Dafi Vitamilk Baby Cleansing Wipes
0.description:
• Skin cleanser and moisturizer
  • Contains milk protein and vitamins E and A to maintain the softness and freshness of the skin
  • Increases skin immunity
  • Contains calendula oil to repair the skin
  • Anti-inflammatory and healing for baby's skin
  • Anti-allergic and antibacterial
  • It has a pH of 5/5 to prevent skin dryness and sensitivity
  • Quantity: 20 sheets

1.title: Baby wipes for sensitive skin (essential oil free)
1.description:
Sensitive baby cleansing wipes, a suitable product for cleaning the face and body of children and babies with sensitive skin

  • Complete and easy face and body cleanser
  • Free of essential oil and, with suitable pH and compatible with sensitive skin
  • Anti-inflammatory and skin redness
  • Anti-allergic and antibacterial
  • Free of alcohol, soap and paraben
  • Quantity: 70 sheets with cover

2.title: Baby cleaning wipes
2.description:
Cleansing and softening wipes for baby's face and body skin to eliminate bacteria

  • Removing any bacteria, pollution and germs from the skin
  • Anti-allergic and relieves skin inflammations
  • Skin softener and moisturizer
  • Contains marigold and aloe vera extracts to keep the skin soft and fresh
  • Free of alcohol, paraben and soap
  • Quantity: 20 sheets
